current.text: An I got accepted to U.S.C. party.

text: No, no.  It's totally cool.  I mean, like, this friend of mine he was- he's been undecided now for, like, the past like eleven years of his life.
okay.  Well I'm not going to be undecided forever. [LAUGHTER]
And it's so close so you can come visit me all the time.
So this works out perfectly.  Because I was worried if I didn't get in to U.S.C., then I would have to go somewhere far away and then-
You'd have to, like go somewhere else, and, you know, we would be apart, and that would suck.
I know.  We should have a party.
